sentences.sentence: Kasserine pass would teach the americans how to fight the wehrmacht.
sentences.translation: 凯瑟琳山口教会了美国人如何与德国国防军作战。

sentences.sentence: Us and wehrmacht mortar teams will no longer charge head on into enemies.
sentences.translation: 美国和德军迫击炮队，将不再改变头像就变成敌人。

sentences.sentence: On September 1, 1939, the German Wehrmacht invaded Poland from east, west and south.
sentences.translation: 1939年9月1日，德国国防军从东、西、南三面入侵波兰。
